name: Regen Rod
description:
Rod's run takes about a minute, if you've committed the nine rooms to memory. The stopwatch starts when Rod moves forward. There are some tight sequences and heroic leaps. Should Rod falter, he'll ride the Regeneration Transport to the room's entrance and feel like a whole new Rod. He can view his time and take it easy in the gift shop.

Xbox controller uses D-pad and A. Keyboard uses Arrows, A, and D to move. Use Ctrl, Space, Up Arrow, or W to jump. Press Start or Esc to exit.

The theme song crossfades into different styles from level to level. The timbre is SID emulation through 32bit VSTs with chorusing.

The regeneration sound was made with the amazing ChipTone. Thank you, SFBGames. https://sfbgames.itch.io

Thank you, SoundsDotZip, for the well designed and beautiful Cheerful-32 palette. https://lospec.com/soundsdotzip

Thank you, Daniel Linssen, for the free use of the wonderful m6x11 font. https://managore.itch.io

Thank you, Donitz, for the gear and blob. Your generators are an education in pixel graphics. https://donitz.itch.io

I also gratefully used Pixelorama, Tiled, and Godot.
